Message.Title: Fantastic opportunity in IBM
Message.Msg: Everything looks real good here. Trading less than 12x last years operating cash flow per share. Pensions should hold considerable value given their 4% discount rate. Great consistent performance in different economic environments including in 2008.

Topic.Title: Stop Whining... Stop Complaining... Get back to Work...

Message.Msg: lawns all cut. No more to cut since its not the growing season here in the northeast. I'm not whining Went for a job at McDonalds. I got beat out by an experienced server. She knows what to do. I'm now applying for a job at a barbershop, sweeping up hair. They asked me if I have broom. I told them yes and I'll bring it in Monday. I got the job!!! I think !!! I also have to bring in coffee. Its a prerequisite for a "newbie".
It has ALWAYS been a "fantastic opportunity in IBM".

Topic.Title: DOD VETS get furloughed this week for 11 weeks, Wall Street say they support VETS , but they don't

Message.Msg: Better look it up , Your FACTS are wrong, DOD civilian are mostly VETERANS some are disabled
